00006 static process_t* kernel_proc = 0;
00007 static unsigned int next_pid = 0;
00008 extern terminal_t* g_kernelTerminal;

00010 process_t* initializeKernelProcess()
00011 {
00012         disable_interrupts();
00013         if (kernel_proc != 0) return kernel_proc;
00014 
00015         process_t* ret = (process_t*) malloc(sizeof(process_t));
00016         memset(ret, 0, sizeof(process_t));
00017         strcpy(ret->m_Name, "KernelProcess");
00018 
00019         ret->m_ID = 0;
00020 
00021         extern page_directory_t* kernel_pagedir;
00022         ret->m_pageDir = kernel_pagedir;
00023 
00024         kernel_proc = ret;
00025 
00026         init_used_list(kernel_proc);
00027 
00028         ret->m_pTerminal = g_kernelTerminal;
00029 
00030         return ret;
00031 }

00033 void freeProcess(process_t* process)
00034 {
00035         //No interrupts ploz
00036         disable_interrupts();
00037 
00038         printf("Process %i exited with return value %i\n", process->m_ID, process->m_returnValue);
00039 
00040         if (process == kernel_proc) {
00041                 return; //Don't want to get rid of PID 0
00042         }
00043         else
00044         {
00045 
00046                 if (process->m_pTerminal != 0)
00047                 {
00048                         if (getTerminalInContext() == process->m_pTerminal)
00049                         {
00050                                 setTerminalContext(g_kernelTerminal);
00051                         }
00052 
00053                         if (process->m_pTerminal != g_kernelTerminal) //Don't delete
00054                         {
00055                                 freeTerminal(process->m_pTerminal);
00056                         }
00057 
00058                         process->m_pTerminal = 0;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 //This kills the used list and frees every used page
00062                 while (process->m_usedListLocation != 0)
00063                 {
00064 
00065                         MEM_LOC top = used_list_top(process);
00066                         freeFrame(top);
00067                         used_list_remove(process, top);
00068 
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 //Empty the post box
00072                 while (process->m_processPostbox.first != 0)
00073                 {
00074                 
00075                         postbox_top(&process->m_processPostbox);
00076 
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 free(process->m_usedListRoot);
00080 
00081                 //freePageDir(process->m_pageDir);
00082 
00083                 free(process);
00084         }
00085 
00086 }

00088 extern process_t* get_current_process();
00089 
00090 int kfork()
00091 {
00092         uint32 esp, ebp;
00093         
00094         disable_interrupts();
00095 
00096         printf("Free frames at start %x\n", calculate_free_frames());
00097 
00098         //Store this for later use
00099         process_t* parent = get_current_process();
00100 
00101         //Create a process space for the new process and null iyt
00102         process_t* new_process = malloc(sizeof(process_t));
00103         memset(new_process, 0, sizeof(process_t));
00104 
00105         //Give it a generic name fo-now
00106         strcpy(new_process->m_Name, "ChildProcess");
00107 
00108         new_process->m_pTerminal = parent->m_pTerminal;
00109         init_used_list(new_process);
00110 
00111         //Set the processes unique ID
00112         next_pid++;
00113         new_process->m_ID = next_pid;
00114 
00115         //Located in virt_mm.c
00116         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00117 
00118         //Copy the page directory
00119         page_directory_t* newprocesspd = copyPageDir(current_pagedir, new_process);
00120 
00121         //Give it a page directory
00122         new_process->m_pageDir = newprocesspd;
00123 
00124         uint32 current_eip = read_eip();
00125 
00126         if (parent->m_ID == get_current_process()->m_ID)
00127         {
00128                 asm volatile("mov %%esp, %0" : "=r"(esp));
00129                 asm volatile("mov %%ebp, %0" : "=r"(ebp));
00130 
00131                 new_process->esp = esp;
00132                 new_process->ebp = ebp;
00133                 new_process->eip = current_eip;
00134 
00135                 scheduler_add(new_process);
00136 
00137                 return 0; //Return 0 - Parent
00138         }
00139         else
00140         {
00141                 return 1; //Return 1 - Child
00142         }
00143 }

00150 inline void switch_process(process_t* from, process_t* to)
00151 {
00152         if (!from || !to) return; //Invalid ptrs?
00153         disable_interrupts();
00154 
00155         uint32 esp, ebp, eip;
00156 
00157         asm volatile("mov %%esp, %0" : "=r"(esp));
00158         asm volatile("mov %%ebp, %0" : "=r"(ebp));
00159 
00160         eip = read_eip();
00161 
00162         if (eip == 0x12345) //Just switched tasks?
00163         {
00164                 return; //Return to whence you came!
00165         }
00166 
00167         from->eip = eip;
00168         from->esp = esp;
00169         from->ebp = ebp;
00170 
00171         eip = to->eip;
00172         esp = to->esp;
00173         ebp = to->ebp;
00174         page_directory_t* pagedir = to->m_pageDir;
00175 
00176         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00177         current_pagedir = pagedir;
00178 
00179         asm volatile("cli; \
00180                       mov %1, %%esp; \
00181                       mov %2, %%ebp; \
00182                       mov %0, %%ecx; \
00183                       mov %3, %%cr3; \
00184                       mov $0x12345, %%eax; \
00185                       sti; \
00186                       jmp *%%ecx;" :: "r" (eip), "r" (esp), "r" (ebp), "r" (pagedir));
00187 
00188         return;
00189 }
00190 
00191 //Jump to the next process
00192 inline void jump_process(process_t* to)
00193 {
00194         if (!to) return; //Invalid ptrs?
00195         disable_interrupts();
00196 
00197         uint32 esp, ebp, eip;
00198 
00199         eip = to->eip;
00200         esp = to->esp;
00201         ebp = to->ebp;
00202 
00203         page_directory_t* pagedir = to->m_pageDir;
00204 
00205         extern page_directory_t* current_pagedir;
00206         current_pagedir = pagedir;
00207 
00208         asm volatile("cli; \
00209                       mov %1, %%esp; \
00210                       mov %2, %%ebp; \
00211                       mov %0, %%ecx; \
00212                       mov %3, %%cr3; \
00213                       mov $0x12345, %%eax; \
00214                       sti; \
00215                       jmp *%%ecx;" :: "r" (eip), "r" (esp), "r" (ebp), "r" (pagedir));
00216 
00217         return;
00218 }

00220 process_message postbox_top(process_postbox* pb)
00221 {
00222         if (pb->first == 0)
00223         {
00224                 process_message ret;
00225                 ret.ID = -1; //-1 = No messages left to read
00226                 return ret;
00227         }
00228 
00229         postbox_message_entry* message = pb->first;
00230 
00231         if (pb->first->next != 0)
00232         {
00233                 pb->first = message->next;
00234         } else
00235         {
00236                 pb->first = 0;
00237         }
00238 
00239         process_message ret = message->data;
00240         free(message);
00241 
00242         return ret;
00243 }
00244 
00245 //Get the top message without removing it
00246 process_message postbox_peek(process_postbox* pb)
00247 {
00248         if (pb->first == 0)
00249         {
00250                 process_message ret;
00251                 ret.ID = -1; //-1 = No messages left to read
00252                 return ret;
00253         }
00254 
00255         return pb->first->data;
00256 }

00258 void set_process_name(process_t* proc, const char* Name)
00259 {
00260         strcpy(proc->m_Name, Name);
00261 }
00262 
00263 void postbox_add(process_postbox* pb, process_message msg)
00264 {
00265         if (pb->first == 0)
00266         {
00267                 //Create pb->first
00268                 postbox_message_entry* new_entry = malloc(sizeof(postbox_message_entry));
00269                 new_entry->data = msg;
00270                 new_entry->next = 0;
00271 
00272                 pb->first = new_entry;
00273         }
00274         else
00275         {
00276                 //Add to the end of the list
00277                 postbox_message_entry* last = pb->first;
00278 
00279                 //Find the last entry
00280                 while (1)
00281                 {
00282                         if (last->next == 0)
00283                         {
00284                                 break;
00285                         } else
00286                         {
00287                                 last = last->next;
00288                         }
00289                 }
00290 
00291                 postbox_message_entry* new_entry = malloc(sizeof(postbox_message_entry));
00292                 new_entry->data = msg;
00293                 new_entry->next = 0;
00294 
00295                 last->next = new_entry;         
00296         }
00297 }
